title: Tools
description: CLI, GUI and web interfaces for exploring data.

lev2.description: A complete REPL & CLI for managing LevelDB instances

level-in.description: A simple command-line utility for writing data to LevelDB via [levelup].

level-out.description: A simple command-line utility for reading LevelDB data via [levelup].

level-key-list.description: Command-line tool for quickly printing a list of keys in a LevelDB database.

lev.description: A CLI REPL interface for LevelDB.

leveldb-repl.description: Super simple REPL for LevelDB. Supports filter globbing.

levelhud.description: LevelDB GUI with an interactive console.

levelweb.description: A LevelDB GUI. Includes simple data visualization tools.

level-cli.description: Interact with LevelDB on the command line.

level-explore.description: A terminal program to visualize LevelDB data. Early stages.

level-repair.description: CLI tool to repair a LevelDB.

leveldb-editor.description: Edit a LevelDB from the command line.

levelui.description: A LevelDB GUI based on [`atom-shell`](https://github.com/atom/atom-shell) (now called Electron).
